articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Famed golfer pays off 50 students' lunch debt
articles.description: Famed golfer Dottie Pepper has paid off all outstanding school lunch debt for a few dozen elementary students in upstate New York
articles.content:
WILTON, N.Y. -- 
Famed golfer Dottie Pepper paid off all outstanding school lunch debt for a few dozen elementary students in upstate New York, just in time for the new year. 
More than 50 students at Dorothy Nolan Elementary School in Saratgoa Springs had … [+1043 chars]

articles.author: DON THOMPSON Associated Press
articles.title: Judge stalls California labor law as it relates to truckers
articles.description: A federal judge temporarily blocked a new California labor law from impacting more than 70,000 independent truckers
articles.content:
SACRAMENTO, Calif. -- 
A federal judge on Tuesday temporarily blocked a new California labor law from impacting more than 70,000 independent truckers.
The law makes it harder for companies to classify workers as independent contractors instead of employees,… [+2196 chars]

articles.author: LYNN ELBER AP Television Writer
articles.title: Jazz musician, Merv Griffin sidekick Jack Sheldon dies at 88
articles.description: An acclaimed jazz trumpeter who was TV host Merv Griffin's longtime sidekick has died
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES -- 
Jack Sheldon, an acclaimed jazz musician whose trumpet graced the award-winning song The Shadow of Your Smile and who was known to TV viewers as the puckish sidekick to talk show host Merv Griffin, has died. He was 88.
Sheldon died Friday of… [+2290 chars]
